forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers and thunderstorms. Low 6C.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain. Lows overnight in the low 40s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 52F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
